award_title: Collaborative Research: Development of a Multiscale Framework to Understand Saturation and Coupled Ice/Salt Crystallization Phenomena in Low/Zero Clinker Cementitious Materials
subject: Making concrete science reproducible
body:
Hi Professor Moradllo,

I noticed your NSF work on designing more durable concrete that holds up in freeze-thaw environments. What caught my attention is how much of your multiscale modeling and experimental work could benefit from being reproducible and shareable across labs.

I'm building Ouroâ€”a place where researchers publish datasets and computational tools as APIs that others can actually discover and build on, not just read about in a methods section.

Could a quick 15-minute call help us explore whether this fits your workflow?

Best,
